text: 12306app is a Chinese mobile app for buying train tickets.彼得：王刚，有个事情需要请教你。王刚：不用客气，你说。彼得：公司需要出差去上海，可是我不知道怎么买火车票。在中国我还没有坐过火车。王刚：没问题。很简单。买火车票你可以直接去火车站，告诉售票员你去哪里，哪个时间段就可以。彼得：是不是还有网上购买的方式？在中国生活，现在这么方便。王刚：是的，你可以下载中国铁路12306app，先注册，然后根据提示购买合适时间地点的就可以了。特别方便。彼得：谢谢，我去试一试。Peter：WangGang, I have something to ask you. 王刚：Of course, speak! Peter：My company needs me to take a business trip to Shanghai, but I don’t know how to buy train tickets. I have never been on the trains in China before. 王刚：No problem, it’s simple. You can buy a ticket directly from the train station. Tell the ticket-seller where you are going, and what time you wish to go. Peter：Is there a method for buying them online? In China, buying in this manner is very convenient. 王刚：Yes, you can download an app: 12306app. First register, then according to the prompts, you can enter the place and time you wish to travel. Super convenient! Peter：Thanks, I’m off to try it.1 – Peter想要去哪里？a. 北京b. 上海c. 西安d. 哈尔滨2 – 可以在网上买票吗？a. 不可以b. 可以1. b2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
